item.title: [PI] Question Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

Nacho L1mey:

sorry but , i just made a new account rights 5 but there is no sign b eside his name. or no proof or anything that says his donor.

Well, You might not have the donator sign in your current client.

If you want to add for example :

1.Sombody logs in and gets the message: your a member!

You simply declare a boolean in your player.java:

public boolean isMember = false;

Now you have to save this boolean into your playersave.java

and at your login method AKA initialize()

You add if(member) { sendMessage("Your a member."); } else { sendMessage("Your not a member."); }

Read full topic
